name: Silent Remains
description:
Silent Remains Made by Tasmi Islam

You are a doctor that has been tasked with saving mankind. To do this, you must search for a cure in an abandoned maze, but beware! There are zombies lurking everywhere. Luckily you have a weapon on hand that can prevent you from being killed.  Make it to the end of the maze with the cure and save the world!

Credits:

Coding by Tasmi Islam, Brackeys, Brian Wilkinson, and Tyler Coleman

Art by Tasmi Islam and Unity Asset Store

Art Station Page:

https://tasmi_azailix315.artstation.com/projects/B1OrBr

Instructions on how to play are displayed on the billboard when starting the game :)
